name: VR Pirates Ahoy - Underwater Shipwrecks Voyage
name_original: VR Pirates Ahoy - Underwater Shipwrecks Voyage
description:
Welcome to Pirates Ahoy - Underwater Shipwrecks Voyage. Deep to the bottom of the Carribean Sea and explore the remains of ancient pirate ships. The galleon of the famous pirate Blackbeard is waiting for you!

This virtual reality simulation includes :

· Realistic 3D models

· Animated fish models, including many different realistic fish, dolphins, giant squids, electric eels and even sea crabs!

· High quality HD graphics

· Compatible with any mobile VR glasses, Cardboard VR technology or any other Side by Side viewer.

Enjoy!

Developed and published by the SS Game Company
